content:
Could someone kindly look at this PR? This is the missing ingredient needed to prove that an infinite sum of p-adics converges iff the terms tend to zero.

(The PR was originally much larger, but a lot of the original content was also independently PR'ed by @Yakov Pechersky, so what's there now is only the bits that Yakov's PR didn't cover.)
LGTM, but spotted one typo :peace_sign:
